import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import { auth } from '../../utils/firebase.utils' import './Header.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser }) => { return (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN ) }
) } export default Header
